entry.title: Lightning Talks - Sunday
entry.summary:
Description

A collection of lightning talks made by the community.

1:15 - Illirik Smirnov - Phone numbers and you: tips, tricks, and footguns 5:15 - Evan Kohilas - What have they done! Why is re.sub changing from Python 3.13? 9:55 - Adam Silkey - "Solving" Python Packaging on Windows, once and â€¦
entry.content:
Description

A collection of lightning talks made by the community.

1:15 - Illirik Smirnov - Phone numbers and you: tips, tricks, and footguns 5:15 - Evan Kohilas - What have they done! Why is re.sub changing from Python 3.13? 9:55 - Adam Silkey - "Solving" Python Packaging on Windows, once and for all 12:00 - Jonathan Daniel - Using uv pip to accelerarte Docker 17:00 - Takanori Suzuki - Put the Cat Emoji in your documents! 22:30 - Jing Cao - What I learned going on strike with the NYTimes Tech Guild 28:00 - Michael McCaffrey - Overcoming ADHD and anxiety to achieve long-term goals 32:50 - Joongi Kim - My 10 years with PyCon KR 38:10 - Dave Peck - A whirlwind tour of t-strings! 43:45 - Sheena O'Connell - Python in Africa 48:00 - Conference Announcements
